H0.text: where did charles darwin and his wife live. Cambridge

H1.text: where did charles darwin and his wife live. Shrewsbury

H2.text: where did charles darwin and his wife live. Edinburgh

H3.text: where did charles darwin and his wife live. London

A4.text: On 29 January, Darwin and Emma Wedgwood were married at Maer in an Anglican ceremony arranged to suit the Unitarians, then immediately caught the train to London and their new home.
